unnormalised: When listing property, include the full address with the PIN code, like 123, Gandhi Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, 560001 and mention if it's near a landmark, e.g., opp. to Forum Mall. This helps potential buyers locate the property easily.
normalised: When listing property, include the full address with the P-I-N code, like one two three, Gandhi Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, five six zero zero zero one and mention if it's near a landmark, e.g., opposite to Forum Mall. This helps potential buyers locate the property easily.
